title: The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Thursday
text:
The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Thursday

Shop and save this Thursday on Amazon. (Photo: Instant Pot / Bodum)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

You're not the only one counting down the days until the weekend. If you've been craving a little break from your regular routine—or a much-needed distraction on your lunch break—you're in luck, because it's an amazing time to get a jump start on your shopping thanks to these Amazon deals happening now.

More: 15 things you shouldn't wait until Black Friday to buy

Whether you're shopping for fun or you're thinking about the holidays already, these discounts can help you save and grab stuff for your home or office that really will make a difference. Here are the 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Thursday.

1. Lowest price alert: This comfy seat cushion

This memory foam cushion comes with a cooling gel layer and it's supposed to help with back pain. (Photo: Comfilife)

Struggle with back aches and constant discomfort from sitting all day long? This memory foam seat cushion could help. Designed with a cooling gel layer that helps add to the comfort factor, this cushion was designed to relieve pressure and help promote a healthier posture. Reviewers with chronic lower back discomfort say that it really works wonders, and with more than 6,000 positive reviews on Amazon, this cushion definitely seems worthwhile. As an added perk, it's at its lowest price ever right now, so you should definitely grab it while you can.

Get the ComfiLife Gel Enhanced Seat Cushion for $25.24 (Save $9.71)

2. $15 off: A 4K streaming stick

These Alexa-compatible Fire Sticks are some of the biggest sellers this Prime Day. (Photo: Amazon)

Tired of streaming your favorite shows and movies from your laptop? Say hello to the Fire Stick 4K, which makes it easy to access Netflix, Hulu, Prime Video, and other channels right on your television. It's a replacement to the original Fire TV, which is one of our favorite media streaming devices, and comes with 4K, Dolby, and HDR, plus an all-new Alexa voice remote that controls a number of different features. Right now, you can get it for $15 off, which is a steal for streaming your favorite fall TV.

Get the Fire TV Stick 4K for $34.99 (Save $15)

3. Under $30: This hub that students will love

The dongle life is not that bad when you've got a good hub. (Photo: Anker)

Perfect for busy students or anyone who just lives on their laptop, this Anker hub is super convenient. If you have a new Macbook and you're living that dongle life, this is a must-have because you get two USB-C ports (one charges, one transmits data), two USB-A ports, a microSD slot and an SD card slot, and an HDMI port that's capable of transmitting 4K picture. Even better? It's only $29, down from $40, with the code ANKER665, so you should definitely grab it up now while you can.

Get the Anker 7-in-1 USB C Adapter for $28.99 (Save $11) with the code ANKER665

4. Under $20: One of the best French presses we've ever used

For the best cup of coffee you'll ever make. (Photo: Bodum)

I'm constantly battling with myself every morning over whether or not to make coffee or get it to go, but when I do make myself coffee in the morning, this French press from Bodum is the one I always use. It's one of the best French presses we've ever tested, and if you want a smooth, aromatic cup of coffee, it's definitely the way to go. There's no cover in front of the pouring spout, which is important to keep in mind before you buy since your coffee will cool down faster, but that shouldn't be a problem if you're making it just for yourself. Right now, you can get it for about $15, which isn't the lowest price we've ever seen, but is still a great discount. This also makes a great gift for coffee lovers.

Get the Bodum Brazil French Press Coffee Maker for $15.25 (Save $4.75)

5. Under $140: This Instant Pot that works with Alexa

"Alexa, what should we cook for dinner tonight?" (Photo: Jackson Ruckar/Reviewed)

Instant Pots are a wonder, especially for those of us who maintain crazy hours during the work week. They make it easy to have healthy, nutritious meals, even when you're short on time (and patience). While there are tons of models to choose from, right now you can snag the smartest Instant Pot yet on sale for a discount you don't want to miss. In our testing, we loved the Instant Pot Smart WiFi and consider it one of the best electric multi-cookers we've ever tested, since it works with Alexa and allows you to control your cooking from virtually anywhere. You can also choose from pre-programmed recipes, which makes it even simpler to whip up meals during hectic work nights. You can snag this multi-cooker for one of its lowest prices ever right now, and get a jump on your holiday shopping in the process.

Get the Instant Pot Smart WiFi 6 Quart for $133.24 (Save $16.71)

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for the latest deals, reviews, and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
